minerva-last-modified-date: Maaleŋ eebo naŋ maale yi $1, a yi a $2 poɔŋ
minerva-watchlist-cta: Baŋ kyɛ biŋ a gampɛle ŋa aneŋ kyiloo zaa naŋ be o eŋaŋ.
mobile-frontend-cookies-required: Ka fooŋ boɔra ka fo leɛ gaa mobaale foni kaabo, see ka fo taa kookiisi sɛne. Sɔrefo la eŋ a sɛne kyɛ leɛ wa.
mobile-frontend-editor-redlink-explain: A gampɛle ŋa naŋ ba maale sɛne.
mobile-frontend-languages-not-available: A gampɛle ŋa ba kye kɔkɔ zaane eŋaŋ.
